data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Gujranwala, Punjab, Pakistan to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gujranwala, Punjab, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 5,652 believers in Gujranwala, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 358 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Gujranwala, Punjab, Pakistan a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the county of Gujranwala.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Pherera (Muslim traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, we pray that the people of Gujranwala, Punjab, Pakistan will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Lord, make the 5,652 believers in Gujranwala to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,021,348 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.section_summary:
the county of Gujranwala, Punjab, Pakistan has a population of 2,027,000.

We estimate Gujranwala has 5,652 people who might know Jesus, 20,270 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,001,078 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 358 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Gujranwala prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
